Remedy.Procedure:
Mix the ingredients well.

Apply it on your inner thighs and massage for 15 minutes.

Wash the area with warm water and pat dry using a cloth.

Mix curd and lemon huice together.

Add a pinch of gram flour or besan and turmeric to the mixture.

Apply on dark inner thighs and leave it to dry.

Gently scrub off using circular motions and use plain water if needed.

Mix the ingredients well.

Apply this paste on the inner thighs and gently scrub in circular motions till sugar disappears.

Let it stay for 10 minutes and then wash it off with water.

Add lemon juice to it.

Apply on your inner thighs and let it stay till it dries off.

Then wash it off.

Mix the ingredients well.

Apply it on inner thighs and let it stay for 15 minutes.

Wash it off with water once it dries.

Mix the ingredients well.

Apply this thick paste on the inner thighs and scrub the area gently.

Wash off after a few minutes and pat dry.

Add tomato juice to it and 1 tablespoon of honey.

Apply the mixture on the inner thighs and let it dry.

Take the peel of an orange and 1 tablespoon of honey.

Squeeze the peel to release its acidic content in the honey.

Now grate or powder the peel and add it to honey.

Now apply this sticky paste on the inner thighs.

Wash it off after 15 minutes with plain water till the stickiness goes away.

Mix the ingredients.

Massage your inner thighs with this pack till all of it is absorbed into your skin.

You can wash off with water if you feel it is sticky or else let it be as it is.

Mix the ingredients well.

Apply the pack on the inner thighs before bedtime.

Let it stay overnight.

You can wash the area with water next morning while bathing.

Mix baking soda and water to create a paste and apply to your underarms.

Gently scrub for a minute, then wash off with clean water and pat dry.

Cut a lemon into thick slices.

Rub it on dark underarms for few months.

Let the lemon juice stay on skin for 10 minutes.

Rinse it off with water thoroughly.

Repeat daily.

Cut 1 medium sized potato into slices.

Rub a slice onto your underarms and let it dry for 10 minutes.

Rinse with lukewarm water.

Repeat 2 times a day will give fast results.

Cut a cucumber into slices and rub onto the dark underarm.

Allow it to sit for a few minutes.

Repeat this process 1 or 2 times in a day until you achieve the results.

Peel the orange and leave the skin to dry under the skin.

Grind into powder.

Mix 2 teaspoons of powdered orange peel with enough rose water and milk.

Stir into a thick paste and apply to the underarms.

Gently scrub the underarms and leave for 15 minutes.

Wash off with cold water.

Repeat 3 times a week.

Ingredients: 2 tablespoons of full fat cream milk
Remedy.Procedure:
Mix the ingredients well.

Apply the milk paste on your dark underarms.

Leave for 10-15 minutes.

Rinse the area thoroughly with cold water.

Repeat 4 times a week.

Mix 2 teaspoons of gram flour and 1 teaspoon each of yogurt and lemon juice, and a pinch of turmeric.

Apply this paste to your dark underarms and gently massage it for 5 minutes.

Wait for about 30 minutes and wash it with warm water.

Follow this process daily for first 2 weeks and then twice a week to get more effective and quick results.

Rinse with cool water.

Rinse it off mild soap and lukewarm water.

Repeat 2 to 3 times daily.

Wet your skin under the arms and apply the mixture.

Rub a little bit of oil on your underarms and let it sit for a few minutes.

Rinse with water.

Remedy.Procedure:
Take a tablespoon or two of yogurt and apply to the armpits.

Gently rub the yogurt all over the dark armpits and wait for few minutes.Then wash it with water and repeat daily.

Massage your hands with some warm olive oil for 5 to 10 minutes twice daily to enjoy soft and smooth hands.

Mix equal amounts of olive oil and fine sugar.

Rub this homemade scrub on your hands using light, circular motions for a few minutes.

Wait 5 minutes, then rinse it off with warm water, pat dry and apply a light moisturizer.

Use this remedy twice a week to soften your hands.

You can also add a little freshly squeezed lemon juice.

Rub this mixture on your hands.

Leave it on for 10 minutes and then rinse it off with warm water.

Apply warm extra-virgin coconut oil on your hands.

Massage for about 5 minutes using circular motions before going to bed.

Wear gloves overnight for best results.

Repeat this simple remedy daily.

Rub some fresh milk cream on your hands.

Allow it to sit for 10 minutes, then rinse off your hands thoroughly with lukewarm water.

You can use this remedy daily.

Repeat 1 or 2 times daily to enjoy soft hands.

Repeat once or twice a week to promote soft, healthy-looking hands.

Ingredients: 2 used Green or Black teabags placed in Refrigerator for 30-40 minutes
2 tablespoons of either olive, almond or vegetable oil
Remedy.Procedure:
Mix 2 drops of jasmine essential oil and 2 tablespoons of either olive, almond or vegetable oil.
Apply to the affected area and gently massage for 3-4 minutes.
Leave for 20-30 minutes and rinse with lukewarm water.
Repeat regularly until results are visible
